pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Saturday, June 27, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks during the Global Goal: Unite for Our Future Summit, which will stream on http://globalgoalunite.org, YouTube, Facebook and Twitter.

Global Goal: Unite for Our Future will later air a concert as of 2:00 p.m. ET on social media, which will replay at 8:00 p.m. ET on CBC, CTV, Global and City TV.

Media Appearance

9:00 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on A Fabulous Morning with Pearse Murray on 103.9 Proud FM Toronto, to discuss Pride Week celebrations.
